column4: can any1 tell me where to get drivers for a nvidia geforce 2 go

they are all installed for you when you install ubuntu
nope. if it works, you're good to go
that's because it's using your hard drive a lot

this is normal behaviour for a netbook, nothing to worry about
is unity meant to work on first boot?
no i meant that things slow down when running a software update
can you paste the exact message?
i know but i don't think anyone can help without more details
try pasting it in google first, then ask here if you can't find anything

no required driver detected for unity. you will need to choose the ubuntu desktop edition once you select your user name. if you are yousing a live cd then your username is ubuntu with a password of ubuntu
